ask.title: SAP System Parameters
ask.help:
SAP Instance Number
Enter the SAP system's instance number.
ask.question: SAP Instance Number

script.source:
function check_instance_no() { local ino=$1
LC_ALL=POSIX
[ -z "$ino" ] && echo "You need to provide a SAP Instance Number." && return 1 [ "${#ino}" -ne 2 ] && echo "The SAP Instance Number needs to be exactly 2 digits long. You entered '${ino}'." && return 1 [ -n "${ino//[0-9]/}" ] && echo "The SAP Instance Number can only contain digits. You entered '${ino}'." && return 1
return 0 } check_instance_no "$VAL"
